mapper.select: select sp.id_ as "id" ,sp.propaganda_code as "propagandaCode" ,case sp.issue_platform when '1' then 'APP' when '2' then '门户' else '其他' end as "issuePlatform" ,date_format(sp.effective_date,'%Y/%m/%d')as "effectiveDate" ,date_format(sp.invalid_date,'%Y/%m/%d')as "invalidDate" ,sp.propaganda_title as "propagandaTitle" ,sp.propaganda_details as "propagandaDetails" ,sp.propaganda_area as "propagandaArea" ,sp.propaganda_area_url as "propagandaAreaUrl" ,sp.poster_url as "posterUrl" ,sp.propaganda_fee as "propagandaFee" from tb_propaganda sp where 1=1 and sp.id_=#{propagandaId} and sp.record_status=1
